body:
I saw the post Tino made and the archive that was done.
I don't get why you say the post was useless (http://gyazo.com/764b269db2ea73408dbdc893002c6514) when we were saying something that's right, maybe, I deserve the 1 hour ban but no people like Tino, Pyro, Avicus_Owner and so on. We were just giving our honest opinion about how unfair the ban was even thought it was a 1 hour one. Unban them at least and not me :P
P,S: No forum ban please and if you're making a response, make one that's good.
Edit: Poking the mods or not does matter as they didn't do anything and they were just using the TS normally, he were using their name + the riot thingy but I don't see the point.

replies.body:
Honestly, who cares. You guys were only banned for 1 hour why complain? 
I would understand if it was like a 24 hour+ ban but seriously you guys can't go 1 hour without TeamSpeak?
Before I get any replies saying "the infraction shouldn't have happened in the first place" WHO CARES. IT'S ONE HOUR DEAL WITH IT.
Sure this shows how unfair the staff are at times but there's a difference between complaining about perm bans then going ahead and complaining about fucking 1 hour bans...

Also, in my opinion you guys did deserve these infractions. You guys are used to being specially treated regulars it's ridiculous. I'm sure if it was someone from OCN they'd be PERM BANNED not ONE HOUR BANNED.

replies.body:
Although I wasn't present, I heard the story from both sides. Each and every one of you are just ranting on about how your "side" of the story is valid, and the other is invalid. Well, let's all look at it this way.

Yes, the staff member who leaked the information should not have even said a word. I will have a conversation with him/her later on, thoroughly explaining why you shouldn't leak important information. This being, a perfectly good example.

On the other hand, the staff member(s) who dealt the 1 hour infractions had every right to do so. It doesn't matter if only a few people were constantly poking and annoying the staff, pleading to take part in beta testing. I was informed that almost everyone in that call had changed their name to "beta test or we riot" or something along those lines. Those of you who were punished had been punished by association. If you've ever heard the term "guilt by association" this is basically a perfect example of that. Not all of you committed the crime, but those of you who were punished took part in one way or another.

Now that you all have the answers you were probably looking for, I'm going to lock this thread. It's only causing tension throughout the Community, and flame wars are getting pretty out of hand.

If you have any more issues, you can contact me privately.

On the other hand, the staff member(s) who dealt the 1 hour infractions had every right to do so. It doesn't matter if only a few people were constantly poking and annoying the staff, pleading to take part in beta testing. If you've ever heard the term "guilt by association" this is basically a perfect example of that. Not all of you committed the crime, but those of you who were punished took part in one way or another.

Now that you all have the answers you were probably looking for, I'm going to lock this thread. It's only causing tension throughout the Community, and flame wars are getting pretty out of hand.

If you have any more issues, you can contact me privately.
